page.title: 03PARKESTON VILLAGE
page.content: Parkeston has become, over the last few years, an important issue in local {politics.}The village itself has gradually been dropping in numbers, and the inhabitants fear that as this trend continues more and more facilities are being removed or not up-dated within the area, so making it more likely for young people to leave the village itself.Over the last three years the locals have been desparately trying to keep{Parkeston School}open, for they say thet if this closes then there will be no local school for the village children to attend.However the School will close at the end of the Summer Term this year, and it will be a shame if this helps to bring about the end of Parkeston.
